course_description: The final module in the MEMBA leadership series addresses "leading with integrity" -- a critical component of principled leadership for global enterprise. The purpose of this course is to enable students to reflect on the importance of integrity and ethics as managerial leaders working in complex, global, dynamic organizations.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the Modular Executive MBA or the Hybrid Executive MBA program.
sections: Class Nbr: 1827, Section #: 2301, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: P. Topping, Status: Open
